snippet: Joran van der Sloot, who became notorious as the prime suspect in the disappearance of Natalee Holloway, pleaded guilty to the 2010 murder of a Peruvian woman he met at a casino and could face 30 years in prison.
abstract: Joran van der Sloot, who became notorious as the prime suspect in the disappearance of Natalee Holloway in Aruba in 2005, pleads guilty to the 2010 murder of Peruvian woman Stephanny Flores, and could face 30 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Joran van der Sloot, who became notorious as the prime suspect in the disappearance of Natalee Holloway, pleaded guilty to the 2010 murder of a Peruvian woman he met at a casino and could face 30 years in prison.

headline.main: Peru: Suspect in Holloway Case Pleads Guilty in Lima Murder
headline.print_headline: Peru: Suspect in Holloway Case Pleads Guilty in Lima Murder
